student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello. I'm happy to play a game with you. Do you like history?
I will think of a famous person from history. You try to guess who it is.
This person was a man. He was a leader.
Yes, he was a king. His name starts with an "H".
Yes, he was King Henry. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
